name: Ninki Seiyuu no Tsukurikata: Limited Edition
storyline: The mid-sized voice actor agency Production Bloom is always short on staff. Keito is an old friend of the manager Kaname, who asked him to help out part-time with the collection of scripts from the sound production company. As he wandered the premises, he met some seiyuus who all had their own worries. This is another side of the voice acting world that is not well known, told from the viewpoint of the seiyuus themselves.
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Ninki Seiyuu no Tsukurikata
- B2 Tapestry
- Soundtrack CD
- Maxi CD
